displayName: Deepest part of the Rainbow Water Cave

parameters:
Do you want to enter the deepest part of the Rainbow Water
Cave?
Clea (Let's prepare first and then do it)
Mage Relm: Here, in this place, is the final ingredient!

Court Mage Eratoma: I can't believe we would meet in a place
like this!

Court Mage Eratoma: It seems that the ingredients for the
dragon and... your desired goal are similar, huh!
Mage Relm: Court Mage...! Are you attacking the mages!?

Court Mage Eratoma: Oh no, that's already mostly finished!
We received a large number of corpses from the campus and
I'm very satisfied.

Thief Nora: Campus... Could it be the Emma Thief
Brigade...?!

Thief Nora: This person is the worst! They're like a monster
who doesn't see humans as humans!

Court Mage Eratoma: Hahaha! Monster, monster, how
delightful, I am truly a monster!

Court Mage Eratoma: My dream is nothing short of a monster!
It is a dream that has swelled up to the point of engulfing
this empire!

Mage Relm: No, that's wrong! Dreams are not like that, you
are mistaken!

Mage Relm: Your dream may not be blessed by anyone, but my
dream will definitely, absolutely be recognized and
blessed...!

Court Mage Eratoma: Hahaha, dreams are lonely things. Not
being able to recognize that, not being able to realize it.

Court Mage Eratoma: As a mage, you're second-rate. Someone
like you is perfect to become the material for my dream!

Priestess Sophia: I have no intention of letting you escape.
Tell me who you are acting under orders from.

Court Mage Eratoma: Very well, very well! Monsters are
always hungry, devouring everything--
Bard: Oh, was I in the middle of performing?
Mage Relm: Hey, why are you here!?
Mage Relm: It's dangerous, so please move away immediately!

Court Mage Eratoma: Hahaha... Ahahaha! You've appeared
again, just as I thought you would!

Court Mage Eratoma: You, the man who erased my first dragon!
That day, that time, Tarasa was destined to be defeated by
the empire!

Court Mage Eratoma: Those who shatter my dream...! Those who
defeat me, a monster... Ahahaha, truly a hero!

Court Mage Eratoma: Let's have a battle between monsters and
heroes! This is the revival of a myth! Now, show me your
strength and defeat me!

Bard: I came here today because I have something to discuss
with you.

Bard: Is there no way to make you give up on your dream of
the grimoire?

Mage Relm: What are you saying... I refuse that! No one
should have the right to make me give up on my dream!

Bard: Because you have the potential to become a destroyer
of the world, I cannot approve of your actions.

Court Mage Eratoma: Look at me! I am the one who can become
the destroyer of the world!

Court Mage Eratoma: I created dragons... I am a monster who
created dragons not once, but twice!

Bard: I must admit, I found it quite interesting that you
can create dragons.

Bard: But there have always been people like you who are not
a threat to the world, and there will continue to be.

Bard: What is truly terrifying is being unaware, not even
considering that one's own actions could become a threat to
the world.
Mage Relm: E-Even if you say such things... I won't!
Bard: Even if you suddenly say that, I can't give up.

Bard: Then shall we go together to see the outcome of your
dream?
